title: Announcement, Review Committee Selections: Deirdre Jackson, Russ Marshall, Grace Serra, 1990
title_raw: Review Committee Selections: Deirdre Jackson, Russ Marshall, Grace Serra
signed: Signature imprinted in black ink, verso, center, left, running downward, sideways: Design: Edward Fella, Write the handreading on the pg.
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in black in three text blocks across upper edge: first text block: Detroit Focus Gallery/ 743 Beaubien, Third Floor/ Detroit, Michigan, 48226/ Hours: Noon to 6p.m. Wed-Sat/ Telephone-(313) 962-9025; second text block: November 16th to December 21st 1990/ Opening reception: Friday November 16th, 5:30-8:3-pm; third text block: Herb Babcock/ Ben Mitchell/ Sandra Osip/ Valerie Pecks/ Bill Sanders/ Anat Shiftan/ Richard Washington/ 1989/1990 Review Committee; across center: Review Committee selection: Deirdre Jackson/ Deirde Jackson/ Russ Marshall/ Russ Marshall/ Grace Serra/ Grace Serra; across lower edge in three text blocks: first text block: Gallery closed for Thanksgiving/ Weekend: November 22 to 24; second text block: December 1st, Gallery closed for/ a "Day without Art" A National Day of Action/ and Mourning in response to the Aids Crisis; third text block: Also in the area: Detroit Artists Market-/ "Gifts for the Holidays" Nov 16-Dec 22
Verso: Imprinted in black across upper left edge, running downward: Detroit/ FOCUS/ gallery/ 743 Beaubien/ 3RD/ FLOOR/ DET-/ ROIT/ MI/ 48226; across lower left quadrant: Detroit Focus Gallery/ Across from the Bricktown People Moving Station/ 743 Beaubien, Third Floor/ Detroit, Michigan 48226/ Equal Opportunity Org. Member of N.A.A.O./ With Support from:/ The Michigan Council for the Arts/ The Detroit Council of the Arts; across lower right quadrant: Non-Profit Org./ Bulk Rate/ U.S. Postage/ Paid/ Detroit, Michigan/ Permit Number 2960
description:
Poster/ announcement printed in black for detroit Focus Gallery exhibition, designed to be mailed.  [Printed] hand-lettered text in a variety of sizes, styles. 
Recto: Four diagonal lines from each corner of sheet meet at title text, center.   Across top edge in three text blocks, location, hours, dates, reception and additional information.  Across lower edge in three text blocks, additional information.  
Verso: Across upper left quadrant, abstract design with tubes, horn shapes.  Across lower half of sheet, text giving sponsors and mailing information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Review Committee Selections: Deirdre Jackson, Russ Marshall, Grace Serra, 1990. Offset lithograph on off-white paper.. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-51
